title: Login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using valid username/email and password credentials, and a session is persisted on page refresh.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click the login button
Verify successful login and redirection to the dashboard
Refresh the page
Confirm session is maintained without logout or redirect loops

title: Login failure with incorrect credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect username or password and displays an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid username/email or password
Click the login button
Verify that login is prevented and an error toast is displayed

title: PIN authentication triggers and validation
description: Ensure PIN verification triggers correctly after login when configured, validates user input, and denies access on wrong PIN.

steps.description: Login with a user account configured with PIN authentication
PIN input screen is displayed
Enter correct PIN
Access to main application is granted
Logout and login again
Enter incorrect PIN
Access is denied, with appropriate error shown and PIN prompt persists

title: Google OAuth login integration
description: Verify that users can log in successfully using Google OAuth and session persists on page refresh.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click the Google login button
Complete OAuth flow and verify user is logged in
Refresh the page
Ensure session persists and user is not logged out

title: Worklog tab switching and URL update
description: Verify that the user can switch between worklog tabs without data loss and the URL query parameter updates accordingly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the worklog page
Open tab A and enter data in the worklog editor
Switch to tab B
Switch back to tab A
Verify that previously entered data in tab A is preserved
Check that URL query parameter reflects the active tab correctly upon switching

title: Automatic and manual worklog data saving
description: Test that worklog data auto-saves periodically and manual save triggers work correctly, synchronizing data without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to a worklog tab and start editing worklog content
Verify that data is automatically saved after a defined interval
Manually trigger the save action
Confirm data is saved immediately and no errors occur
Simulate network failure during save
Check user-friendly error toast is shown and app recovers gracefully

title: Shift pattern wizard multi-step input and data integrity
description: Verify all steps of the shift pattern wizard perform correctly, retain data across navigation, validate inputs, and maintain data integrity upon completion.

steps.description: Navigate to shift pattern configuration wizard
Enter valid data in step 1 and proceed to step 2
Verify data input in step 1 is preserved after moving forward and backward
Input invalid data in any step (e.g. missing required fields) and attempt to proceed
Validation prevents moving forward and shows appropriate messages
Complete wizard successfully
Confirm created shift pattern is saved and visible in the list

title: Worker assignment in shift pattern wizard
description: Ensure that unassigned workers are listed correctly and that assignments update shift patterns properly.

steps.description: Open shift pattern wizard to the worker assignment step
Verify unassigned workers list reflects current data accurately
Assign a worker to a specific shift
Confirmed assignment reflects correctly in the UI and data store
Unassign a worker
Worker returns to unassigned list and shift data updates appropriately

title: Create and edit community board post with image upload
description: Validate post creation and editing functions with rich text editor, image upload including resizing, and save without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to community board post creation page
Enter post content with rich text formatting
Upload an image and resize it in the editor
Save the post
Confirm post is saved and image appears correctly
Open the saved post for editing
Edit content and save changes
Verify edits are applied and no errors occur

title: Post comments with emoji picker and optimistic UI
description: Check that comments support emoji insertion via picker, display correctly, and optimistic updates improve user experience.

steps.description: Navigate to a community post detail page
Open comment input and select emojis using the emoji picker
Submit the comment
Comment appears immediately with emojis rendered while waiting for server confirmation
Simulate network failure during comment submission
Verify user-friendly error toast and comment status correctly updated

title: AI-generated summary reliability for community posts
description: Ensure AI-generated summaries are displayed accurately for posts and refresh or update on post edits.

steps.description: Navigate to a community post detail page
Verify AI summary is generated and displayed
Edit the post content
Trigger summary refresh
Confirm updated AI summary reflects the edited content

title: Broadcast schedule filtering with color-coded legend
description: Test that broadcasts list can be filtered by schedule and each broadcast is displayed with appropriate color coding.

steps.description: Navigate to broadcasts list page
Apply filters to show specific schedules
Verify broadcasts visible correspond to the selected filters
Confirm color-coded display matches broadcast status or schedule type

title: Broadcast monitor page responsiveness and full-screen layout
description: Ensure that the broadcast detailed monitoring view adapts responsively across device sizes and functions in full-screen mode without layout issues.

steps.description: Navigate to broadcast monitor page for a selected broadcast
Verify layout adapts properly when resized for various desktop and mobile screen widths
Toggle to full-screen mode
Confirm no UI elements break or become unusable in full-screen

title: Dark mode toggle and UI consistency
description: Verify that the global dark mode toggle works correctly across all screens, including login, worklog, shift, community, and broadcast pages without flicker or style issues.

steps.description: Login and navigate to various application pages
Toggle the dark mode switch
Confirm all UI components switch styles appropriately with no layout or readability issues
Reload pages in both light and dark mode
Verify mode persistence and no flickering on page load

title: Responsive sidebar toggle on mobile devices
description: Test the sidebar's ability to toggle open/close on mobile screen sizes and that navigation is functional without glitches.

steps.description: Resize browser window or use mobile device or emulator to access the app
Open and close sidebar navigation
Verify sidebar toggles smoothly without flicker or content overlap
Navigate using sidebar links
Ensure pages load correctly with responsive layout

title: API failure handling with user-friendly error toasts
description: Simulate API failures across multiple features (login, worklog save, post creation) and verify the UI displays concise, clear error toasts and remains usable.

steps.description: Simulate backend API failure during login attempt
Check for user-friendly error toast and no app crash or freeze
Simulate failure during worklog data save
Verify error toast appears and user can retry saving
Simulate failure during post submission
Confirm error message shown and optimistic UI rolls back if needed
